scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && next build && next export && echo ryosuzuki.org > out/CNAME && touch out/.nojekyll && mv out/static/publications out/ && mv out/static/cv/cv.pdf out/ && git add out/
scripts.push: git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages
scripts.force: git push origin `git subtree split --prefix out master`:gh-pages --force
